code:
def getPaymentMethod(method: String): String =
  method match
    case "card" | "paypal" => method
    case _ => throw new Exception("Unsupported payment method")

def applyCoupon(total: Double, coupon: Option[String]): Double =
  coupon match
    case Some("XMAS10") => total - 10
    case Some(_) => throw new Exception("Invalid coupon")
    case None => total

def findProductById(id: Long, products: Map[Long, String]): String =
  products.get(id) match
    case Some(name) => name
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException("Product not found")

def computeTax(amount: Double, region: String): Double =
  region match
    case "US" => amount * 0.07
    case "EU" => amount * 0.2
    case _ => throw new Exception("Unsupported region for tax")

def selectShippingMethod(method: String): Int =
  method.toLowerCase match
    case "standard" => 3
    case "express" => 1
    case _ => throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid shipping method")

def giftWrapOption(option: String): Boolean =
  option match
    case "yes" => true
    case "no" => false
    case _ => throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid gift wrap option")

def fetchOrderStatus(orderId: Int, orders: Map[Int, String]): String =
  orders.get(orderId) match
    case Some(status) => status
    case None => throw new Exception("Order ID does not exist")

def getCardByNumber(cards: List[Card], number: String): Card =
  cards.find(_.number == number).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Card not found"))

def schedulePayment(date: LocalDate): Unit =
  if date.isBefore(LocalDate.now()) then throw new Exception("Cannot schedule payment in the past")

def getTransactionById(transactions: List[Transaction], id: String): Transaction =
  transactions.find(_.id == id).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Transaction ID not found"))

def validateOtp(otp: String, correct: String): Unit =
  if otp != correct then throw new Exception("Invalid OTP")

def cancelAppointment(appointmentId: Int): Unit =
  if appointmentId <= 0 then throw new Exception("Invalid appointment ID")

def selectVideoPlatform(platform: String): String =
  if platform != "Zoom" && platform != "Skype" then 
    throw new Exception(s"Unsupported platform: $platform")
  else platform

def sendReminder(patientId: Int, message: String): Unit =
  if message.trim.isEmpty then throw new Exception("Message cannot be empty")

def getActiveMinutes(log: Map[String, Int], day: String): Int =
  log.get(day) match
    case Some(minutes) => minutes
    case None => throw new Exception(s"No data for $day")

def validateSleepData(hours: Double): Unit =
  if hours < 0 || hours > 24 then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Sleep hours must be 0-24")

  plans.find(_.isActive).getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("No active plan found"))

code:
def updateDriverLocation(driverId: Int, latitude: Double, longitude: Double): Unit =
  if latitude < -90 || latitude > 90 || longitude < -180 || longitude > 180 then
    throw new Exception("Invalid coordinates")
  println(s"Driver $driverId location updated")

def findFlightByNumber(flights: List[String], number: String): String =
  flights.find(_ == number).getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("Flight not found"))

def getPassenger(passengers: Map[Int, String], id: Int): String =
  passengers.get(id).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Passenger not found"))

def cancelBooking(bookingId: Option[String]): String =
  bookingId match
    case Some(id) => s"Booking $id cancelled"
    case None => throw new Exception("No booking to cancel")

def validateTicket(ticket: String): Unit =
  if ticket.isEmpty then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid ticket")

def getLoungeAccessClass(ticketClass: String): Boolean =
  ticketClass match
    case "Business" => true
    case "First" => true
    case _ => throw new Exception("No lounge access")

def findGate(gates: List[String], flight: String): String =
  gates.find(_.startsWith(flight)).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No gate assigned"))

def checkFlightStatus(status: Option[String]): String =
  status.getOrElse(throw new Exception("Flight status unknown"))

def getBoardingGroup(ticket: Map[String, Int], id: String): Int =
  ticket.get(id).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No boarding group"))

def cancelBooking(bookingId: Option[Int]): String =
  bookingId match
    case Some(id) => s"Booking $id cancelled"
    case None => throw new Exception("No booking ID provided")

def getMealPlan(plan: String): String =
  plan match
    case "Full" | "Half" => plan
    case _ => throw new Exception("Unknown meal plan")

def setDeliveryAddress(address: String): Unit =
  if address.isBlank then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Address cannot be empty")

def fetchMenuItem(menu: Map[String, Int], item: String): Int =
  menu.get(item) match
    case Some(price) => price
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException("Menu item not found")

def calculateDiscount(code: Option[String]): Double =
  code match
    case Some("FOOD10") => 0.10
    case Some("DELIVERY5") => 0.05
    case Some(_) => throw new Exception("Invalid discount code")
    case None => 0.0

def findAvailableSlot(slots: List[String]): String =
  slots.find(_.nonEmpty).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No available slots"))

def validateOrderAmount(amount: Double): Unit =
  if amount < 0 then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Amount cannot be negative")

def checkInventory(item: String, inventory: Map[String, Int]): Int =
  inventory.get(item) match
    case Some(count) if count > 0 => count
    case _ => throw new Exception("Item out of stock")

def verifyCustomerToken(token: Option[String]): Boolean =
  token match
    case Some(t) if t.startsWith("VALID") => true
    case _ => throw new Exception("Invalid customer token")

def getUserSubscriptionLevel(user: String, levels: Map[String, String]): String =
  levels.get(user) match
    case Some(level) => level
    case None => throw new Exception(s"User $user does not have a subscription level")

def getArtistGenre(artist: String, genres: Map[String, String]): String =
  genres.getOrElse(artist, throw new Exception(s"Genre not found for artist $artist"))

def getLyrics(songId: Int, lyricsDb: Map[Int, String]): String =
  lyricsDb.get(songId) match
    case Some(lyrics) => lyrics
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException(s"Lyrics for song $songId not found")

def playNext(tracks: List[String]): String =
  tracks.headOption.getOrElse(throw new RuntimeException("No more tracks to play"))

def getAlbum(albumId: Int, albums: Map[Int, String]): String =
  albums.get(albumId) match
    case Some(album) => album
    case None => throw new Exception(s"Album id $albumId does not exist")

def fetchArtwork(song: String, artDb: Map[String, Array[Byte]]): Array[Byte] =
  artDb.get(song).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Artwork not found for song: " + song))

def getBitrate(format: String): Int =
  format match
    case "MP3" => 320
    case "AAC" => 256
    case _ => throw new Exception(s"Unknown audio format: $format")

def getPrivateKey(mnemonic: Option[String]): String =
  mnemonic match
    case Some(phrase) => s"key-for-$phrase"
    case None => throw new Exception("No mnemonic provided")

def exportSeed(seedOption: Option[String]): String =
  seedOption.getOrElse(throw new Exception("No seed available for export"))

def getPublicKey(wallet: Option[String]): String =
  wallet match
    case Some(w) => s"publicKey-for-$w"
    case None => throw new Exception("Wallet not loaded")

def findItemById(id: Int, items: List[(Int, String)]): String =
  items.find(_._1 == id).map(_._2).getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException(s"Item $id not found"))

def getStockLevel(item: String, inventory: Map[String, Int]): Int =
  inventory.get(item).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Item not found in inventory."))

def findWarehouse(warehouses: Seq[String], name: String): Int =
  warehouses.indexOf(name) match
    case -1 => throw new Exception("Warehouse not found.")
    case idx => idx

def withdrawItem(item: String, qty: Int, inv: Map[String, Int]): Map[String, Int] =
  inv.get(item) match
    case Some(current) if current >= qty => inv.updated(item, current - qty)
    case Some(_) => throw new Exception("Not enough stock available.")
    case None => throw new Exception("Item not found in inventory.")

def scanBarcode(barcode: Option[String]): String =
  barcode.getOrElse(throw new Exception("No barcode provided."))

def itemCategory(code: String): String =
  code match
    case c if c.startsWith("FRG") => "Fragile"
    case c if c.startsWith("HVY") => "Heavy"
    case _ => throw new Exception("Unknown item category code.")

def getContentText(post: Option[String]): String =
  post.getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("Content not found."))

def removePost(postId: Option[Int]): Unit =
  postId match
    case Some(id) => println(s"Post $id removed.")
    case None => throw new Exception("No post ID provided.")

def getImageUrl(imageOpt: Option[String]): String =
  imageOpt.getOrElse(throw new Exception("Image URL not found."))

def getProfilePicture(user: Option[User]): String =
  user match
    case Some(u) => u.picture
    case None => throw new Exception("User not found.")

class Locator
  def nearest(lat: Double, lon: Double): String =
    if lat < -90 || lat > 90 || lon < -180 || lon > 180 then
      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid coordinates!")
    "Station-001"

val locator = Locator()
locator.nearest(95, 5)

def stationAddress(id: Option[String]): String =
  id match
    case Some(value) => s"Address for $value"
    case None => throw new RuntimeException("Missing station id!")

def getSoilMoisture(readings: List[Int], sensorId: Int): Int =
  readings.lift(sensorId).getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("Sensor not found"))

def getFieldName(fields: Map[Int, String], fieldId: Int): String =
  fields.getOrElse(fieldId, throw new Exception("Field ID not found"))

def lastRainDate(rainDates: List[String]): String =
  rainDates.lastOption.getOrElse(throw new RuntimeException("No rain data available"))

def fertilizerRate(typeCode: String): Int = typeCode match
  case "N" => 10
  case "P" => 15
  case "K" => 20
  case _   => throw new Exception("Unknown fertilizer type")

def fetchSensorData(sensorId: String, data: Map[String, Int]): Int =
  data.get(sensorId).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No data for sensor"))

def checkHarvesterReady(battery: Int): Unit =
  if battery < 20 then throw new Exception("Harvester battery too low")

def cropDiseaseIndex(index: Map[String, Double], disease: String): Double =
  index.getOrElse(disease, throw new Exception("Disease data unavailable"))

def getCropArea(cropAreas: List[(String, Int)], crop: String): Int =
  cropAreas.find(_._1 == crop).map(_._2).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Crop type not found"))

def estimateYieldPerCrop(yields: Map[String, Int], crop: String): Int =
  yields.getOrElse(crop, throw new Exception("Yield info missing for crop"))

case class Sensor(id: String, value: String)

def getIntValue(sensor: Sensor): Int =
  try sensor.value.toInt
  catch case _: NumberFormatException => throw new Exception("Invalid integer value for sensor " + sensor.id)

def fetchSensorById(id: String, sensors: Map[String, Double]): Double =
  sensors.get(id).getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException(s"Sensor $id not found"))

def updateStatus(sensorId: String, status: Map[String, Boolean]): Boolean =
  status.get(sensorId) match
    case Some(s) => s
    case None    => throw new Exception(s"Sensor $sensorId status not found")

def ensureSensorActive(sensor: Sensor, statuses: Map[String, Boolean]): Unit =
  if !statuses.getOrElse(sensor.id, false) then throw new Exception(s"Sensor ${sensor.id} not active")

def firstNonZero(readings: List[Double]): Double =
  readings.find(_ != 0).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No nonzero readings found"))

def transferTime(line: String): Int =
  line match
    case "Express" => 2
    case "Local" => 5
    case _ => throw new Exception("Unknown line type")

def findStationId(name: String): Int =
  val stationIds = Map("Main" -> 101, "Park" -> 102)
  stationIds.get(name) match
    case Some(id) => id
    case None => throw new Exception("Station not found: " + name)

def parseTime(str: String): Int =
  try str.toInt catch case _ => throw new NumberFormatException("Invalid time format")

def findCommonStation(routeA: List[String], routeB: List[String]): String =
  routeA.find(routeB.contains).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No common stations"))

def requireBikeAllowed(line: String, allowBikes: Boolean): Unit =
  if !allowBikes then throw new UnsupportedOperationException(s"Bikes not allowed on $line")

def getRouteId(routeName: String): Int =
  val routes = Map("A-Line" -> 1, "B-Line" -> 2)
  routes.get(routeName) match
    case Some(id) => id
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException(s"No route called $routeName")

def validateEmail(email: String): Unit =
  if !email.contains("@") then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid email address")

def validateInputFields(map: Map[String, String]): Unit =
  if !map.contains("principal") then throw new Exception("Principal field missing")

def retrieveUserInput(field: String, inputs: Map[String, String]): String =
  inputs.getOrElse(field, throw new Exception(s"Missing field: $field"))

def displayAPR(apr: Option[Double]): String =
  apr match
    case Some(v) => f"APR: $v%.2f%%"
    case None => throw new Exception("APR unavailable")

def convertTerm(termInYears: Any): Int =
  termInYears match
    case i: Int => i
    case s: String => s.toInt
    case _ => throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad term input type")

def checkEligibility(income: Double, minIncome: Double): Unit =
  if income < minIncome then throw new Exception("Income too low for mortgage")

def extractPressure(data: Map[String, String]): Int =
  data.get("pressure") match
    case Some(value) => value.toInt
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException("No pressure in data")

def getSensorStatus(sensorList: List[String], index: Int): String =
  if index < 0 || index >= sensorList.length then
    throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("Invalid sensor index")
  else
    sensorList(index)

def findMachineById(id: Int, machines: Map[Int, String]): String =
  machines.get(id) match
    case Some(m) => m
    case None => throw new RuntimeException(s"Machine $id not found")

def reportAlarm(code: String): String =
  code match
    case "E101" => "Overheat"
    case "E102" => "Low pressure"
    case _ => throw new UnsupportedOperationException(s"Unknown alarm code: $code")

def getOperationalHours(machines: Map[String, Int], name: String): Int =
  machines.get(name) match
    case Some(hours) => hours
    case None => throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown machine")

def validateTelemetryField(field: String, value: Option[String]): String =
  value match
    case Some(v) => v
    case None => throw new Exception(s"Field $field missing in telemetry data")

def getLocation(info: Map[String, String]): String =
  info.get("location") match
    case Some(location) => location
    case None => throw new Exception("Location data unavailable")

def getOperatorShift(shifts: Map[String, String], op: String): String =
  shifts.get(op) match
    case Some(shift) => shift
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException(s"No shift info for operator $op")

def selectLobby(lobbies: List[String], name: String): String =
  lobbies.find(_ == name).getOrElse(throw new Exception(s"Lobby '$name' not found"))

def findUser(users: List[String], user: String): Int =
  users.indexOf(user) match
    case -1 => throw new Exception(s"User $user not found in lobby")
    case idx => idx

def getLobbySettings(settings: Map[String, String], key: String): String =
  settings.getOrElse(key, throw new Exception(s"Missing setting: $key"))

def checkPermissions(userRoles: Set[String], needed: String): Unit =
  if (!userRoles.contains(needed)) throw new Exception("Insufficient permissions")

def authenticate(token: Option[String]): String =
  token.getOrElse(throw new Exception("Authentication token missing"))

def getVRDeviceInfo(devices: Map[String, String], deviceId: String): String =
  devices.get(deviceId) match
    case Some(info) => info
    case None => throw new Exception(s"Device $deviceId not found")

def getProjectHours(project: Map[String, Int], projectName: String): Int =
  project.getOrElse(projectName, throw new NoSuchElementException("Project not found"))

def employeeName(employee: Option[String]): String =
  employee.getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("No employee name provided"))

def getDailyReport(reports: Map[String, String], date: String): String =
  reports.getOrElse(date, throw new Exception("No report for the date"))

def findEmployeeById(ids: List[Int], id: Int): Int =
  ids.find(_ == id).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Employee not found"))

def getAlertType(code: String): String =
  code match
    case "WX1" => "Flood Warning"
    case "WX2" => "Thunderstorm Warning"
    case _ => throw new Exception("Unknown alert code")

def sendNotification(userId: Option[String], message: String): Unit =
  userId match
    case Some(id) => println(s"Sending '$message' to $id")
    case None => throw new Exception("User ID is missing")

def getRegionOrThrow(region: Option[String]): String =
  region.getOrElse(throw new Exception("Region not found in request"))

def temperatureDelta(today: Option[Int], yesterday: Option[Int]): Int =
  (today, yesterday) match
    case (Some(t), Some(y)) => t - y
    case _ => throw new Exception("Missing temperature data")

def getCityFromRequest(params: Map[String, String]): String =
  params.get("city").getOrElse(throw new Exception("City parameter missing"))

def requireAuthToken(token: Option[String]): String =
  token.getOrElse(throw new Exception("Missing auth token."))

def computeScore(score: Option[Int]): Int =
  score match
    case Some(value) => value
    case None => throw new Exception("Missing fraud score.")

def checkTransactionStatus(status: String): Unit =
  if status != "approved" then throw new Exception(s"Transaction $status not allowed.")

def getCustomerEmail(info: Map[String, String]): String =
  info.get("email").getOrElse(throw new Exception("Email not found in customer info."))

def ensureAccountEnabled(enabled: Boolean): Unit =
  if !enabled then throw new Exception("Account is not enabled for payments.")

def verifySignature(signature: String, expected: String): Unit =
  if signature != expected then throw new Exception("Invalid digital signature.")

def acceptableRisk(riskScore: Int): Unit =
  if riskScore > 80 then throw new Exception("Risk score too high for payment.")

def getMerchantId(details: Map[String, Int]): Int =
  details.get("merchantId").getOrElse(throw new Exception("Merchant ID missing."))

def confirm2FA(codeEntered: Option[String]): Boolean =
  codeEntered match
    case Some(code) if code == "123456" => true
    case _ => throw new Exception("2FA failed.")

def paymentLimitCheck(amount: Double, limit: Double): Unit =
  if amount > limit then throw new Exception("Payment exceeds allowed limit.")

def getPixelIntensity(image: Array[Array[Int]], x: Int, y: Int): Int =
  if x < 0 || y < 0 || x >= image.length || y >= image(0).length then
    throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("Invalid pixel coordinates")
  else
    image(x)(y)

def findSlice(volume: Array[Array[Array[Int]]], sliceIndex: Int): Array[Array[Int]] =
  if sliceIndex < 0 || sliceIndex >= volume.length then
    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Slice index out of bounds")
  else
    volume(sliceIndex)

def loadDicomFile(path: String): DicomImage =
  if !path.endsWith(".dcm") then
    throw new RuntimeException("File is not a DICOM image")
  else
    DicomImage(path)

case class DicomImage(path: String)

def getAnnotation(annotations: Map[String, String], key: String): String =
  annotations.get(key) match
    case Some(value) => value
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException(s"Annotation '$key' not found")

def parseImageHeader(header: String): (Int, Int) =
  val fields = header.split(",")
  if fields.length != 2 then
    throw new RuntimeException("Invalid header format")
  else
    (fields(0).toInt, fields(1).toInt)

def blendImages(img1: Array[Array[Int]], img2: Array[Array[Int]]): Array[Array[Int]] =
  if img1.length != img2.length || img1(0).length != img2(0).length then
    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Image sizes don't match")
  else
    img1.zip(img2).map((row1, row2) => row1.zip(row2).map((a, b) => (a + b) / 2))

def extractRegion(image: Array[Array[Int]], x: Int, y: Int, w: Int, h: Int): Array[Array[Int]] =
  if x < 0 || y < 0 || x+w > image.length || y+h > image(0).length then
    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Region out of bounds")
  image.slice(x, x+w).map(_.slice(y, y+h))

def validateImageDimensions(width: Int, height: Int): Unit =
  if width <= 0 || height <= 0 then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid image dimensions")

def getPixelSpacing(header: Map[String, String]): Double =
  header.get("PixelSpacing") match
    case Some(s) => s.toDouble
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException("PixelSpacing not found in header")

code:
def validateToken(token: Option[String]): String =
  token match
    case Some(t) => t
    case None => throw new Exception("Authentication token missing")

def getRegionConsumption(data: Map[String, Int], region: String): Int =
  data.get(region) match
    case Some(valr) => valr
    case None => throw new NoSuchElementException("Region not found")

def setAlertLevel(level: String): Int =
  level.toLowerCase match
    case "low" => 1
    case "medium" => 2
    case "high" => 3
    case _ => throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown alert level")

def checkAdmin(user: (String, Boolean)): Unit =
  if !user._2 then throw new SecurityException("User is not admin")

def verifyTotalVotes(actual: Int, expected: Int): Unit =
  if actual != expected then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Vote totals do not match")

def getBallotForVoter(ballots: Map[String, String], voter: String): String =
  ballots.getOrElse(voter, throw new NoSuchElementException("No ballot for voter"))

def findBookByTitle(catalog: List[String], title: String): String =
  catalog.find(_ == title).getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("Book not found"))

def getAuthor(authors: Map[String, String], book: String): String =
  authors.get(book) match
    case Some(author) => author
    case None => throw new RuntimeException(s"Author of $book not found")

def searchYear(books: List[(String, Int)], year: Int): String =
  books.find(_._2 == year)
    .map(_._1)
    .getOrElse(throw new Exception("No book published in that year"))

def findLibrarySection(section: Option[String]): String =
  section.getOrElse(throw new IllegalArgumentException("Section required"))

def checkAvailable(copiesAvailable: Int): Unit =
  if copiesAvailable <= 0 then throw new Exception("No copies available!")

def getUserId(users: List[String], username: String): Int =
  users.indexOf(username) match
    case -1 => throw new Exception("User not found")
    case idx => idx

def reserveBook(isbn: String, reserved: Set[String]): Unit =
  if reserved.contains(isbn) then throw new IllegalStateException("Already reserved")

class Book(title: String, pages: Int):
  if pages <= 0 then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Pages must be positive")

def fetchPDF(bookTitle: String, pdfMap: Map[String, Array[Byte]]): Array[Byte] =
  pdfMap.getOrElse(bookTitle, throw new Exception("PDF not found"))

def searchByKeyword(keywords: List[String], term: String): String =
  keywords.find(_.toLowerCase == term.toLowerCase).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Keyword not found"))

def checkDueDate(dueDays: Int): Unit =
  if dueDays < 0 then throw new Exception("Book is overdue!")

def getSummary(summaries: Map[String, String], title: String): String =
  summaries.get(title).getOrElse(throw new Exception(s"No summary for $title"))

def findJournal(journals: List[String], name: String): String =
  journals.find(_ == name).getOrElse(throw new RuntimeException("Journal not in catalog"))

def checkEventDate(date: String): Unit =
  if date != "2024-07-01" then throw new RuntimeException("Event date mismatch")

def decodeQR(qr: String): (Int, String) =
  qr.split("-") match
    case Array(id, event) => (id.toInt, event)
    case _ => throw new Exception("Invalid QR format")

def checkPermission(role: String): Unit =
  if role != "admin" then throw new Exception("Insufficient rights")

def markAsUsed(ticketId: Int, used: Set[Int]): Unit =
  if used.contains(ticketId) then throw new IllegalStateException("Already used")

def findDroneById(id: String, droneList: List[String]): String =
  droneList.find(_ == id).getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException(s"Drone $id not found"))

def checkPayload(dronePayload: Double, maxAllowed: Double): Unit =
  if dronePayload > maxAllowed then throw new RuntimeException("Payload exceeds limit!")

def getDeliveryTime(route: String, times: Map[String, Int]): Int =
  times.getOrElse(route, throw new Exception("Unknown route!"))

def validateWaypoint(waypoint: (Double, Double)): Unit =
  if waypoint._1 < 0 || waypoint._2 < 0 then throw new Exception("Negative coordinates are invalid!")

def assignRoute(drone: String, route: Option[String]): String =
  route.getOrElse(throw new Exception(s"No route found for $drone"))

def requireAuthorization(user: String, authorized: Set[String]): Unit =
  if !authorized.contains(user) then throw new Exception("Unauthorized user!")

def validateEmail(email: String): Unit =
  if !email.contains("@") then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid email address")

def claimType(code: Int): String =
  code match
    case 1 => "Health"
    case 2 => "Auto"
    case 3 => "Property"
    case _ => throw new Exception("Unknown claim type code")

def getUserClaim(userId: String, claims: Map[String, Claim]): Claim =
  claims.get(userId) match
    case Some(claim) => claim
    case None => throw new Exception("No claim found for user")

def selectPolicyType(option: Int): String =
  option match
    case 0 => "Comprehensive"
    case 1 => "Third Party"
    case _ => throw new RuntimeException("Unsupported policy type")

def verifyDocument(doc: Document): Unit =
  if doc.pages < 1 then throw new Exception("Document is empty!")

def getAgent(agentId: String, agents: List[Agent]): Agent =
  agents.find(_.id == agentId).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Agent not found"))

def checkCoverage(claim: Claim, coverage: Double): Unit =
  if claim.amount > coverage then throw new Exception("Claim exceeds coverage")

def requireLogin(user: Option[User]): User =
  user.getOrElse(throw new Exception("User must be logged in"))

def fetchQuizScore(quizzes: Map[String, Int], quizId: String): Int =
  quizzes.getOrElse(quizId, throw new IllegalArgumentException(s"Quiz $quizId not found"))

def studentNameById(ids: Map[Int, String], id: Int): String =
  ids.get(id) match
    case Some(name) => name
    case None => throw new Exception(s"Student with id $id not found.")

def markToGrade(mark: Int): String =
  if mark < 0 || mark > 100 then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid mark range")
  else if mark >= 90 then "A"
  else if mark >= 80 then "B"
  else if mark >= 70 then "C"
  else if mark >= 60 then "D"
  else "F"

def firstSubmission(submissions: List[String]): String =
  submissions.headOption.getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("No submissions yet"))

def getInstructorRating(ratings: Map[String, Double], name: String): Double =
  ratings.get(name) match
    case Some(rating) => rating
    case None => throw new RuntimeException("No rating for instructor: " + name)

def findDonor(donors: List[String], name: String): String =
  donors.find(_ == name).getOrElse(throw new Exception("Donor not found"))

def getMatchingDonationRate(rates: Map[String, Double], donorType: String): Double =
  rates.get(donorType).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No matching rate for donor type"))

def getCharityById(charities: Map[Int, String], id: Int): String =
  charities.get(id).getOrElse(throw new Exception(s"Charity with ID $id not found"))

class Donor(val name: String, val email: String):
  if !email.contains("@") then throw new IllegalArgumentException("Email is invalid")

def findFundraiser(fundraisers: List[String], id: Int): String =
  fundraisers.lift(id).getOrElse(throw new Exception("No fundraiser with given index"))

def sendThankYouEmail(email: String): Unit =
  if !email.endsWith(".org") then throw new Exception("Not a valid organizational email")

def fetchLatestScore(apiResult: Option[Int]): Int =
  apiResult.getOrElse(throw new NoSuchElementException("No score from API"))

def scoreForQuarter(scores: Map[Int, Int], quarter: Int): Int =
  scores.getOrElse(quarter, throw new Exception(s"No score for quarter $quarter"))

def getScoreDiff(scores: Map[String, Int], teamA: String, teamB: String): Int =
  (scores.get(teamA), scores.get(teamB)) match
    case (Some(a), Some(b)) => a - b
    case _ => throw new Exception("One or both teams missing")

def findAvailableCar(cars: List[Car]): Car =
  cars.find(_.isAvailable) match
    case Some(car) => car
    case None => throw new Exception("No available cars.")

def getCustomerById(customers: Map[Int, Customer], id: Int): Customer =
  customers.get(id) match
    case Some(c) => c
    case None => throw new Exception(s"Customer $id not found.")

def reserveCar(carId: Int, reserved: Set[Int]): Unit =
  if reserved.contains(carId) then throw new Exception("Car already reserved.")

def findCarByVin(fleet: Seq[Car], vin: String): Car =
  fleet.find(_.vin == vin) match
    case Some(car) => car
    case None => throw new Exception("VIN not found in fleet.")
